info.title: NTM REST API
info.description: Generated from docs/parity_matrix.json. Draft OpenAPI 3.1 spec covering CLI/TUI/robot parity.

get.description: Returns NTM version and build info.
Returns dependency check results (tmux, go, etc.).
Validates ecosystem tool health and configuration.

post.description: Starts the NTM HTTP server (no-op if already running).
Creates project scaffold and spawns agents.

results.snippet: robot snapshot output includes sessions, panes, agents

value.summary: Recent sessions focus on robot-mode automation.

post.description: Exchange credentials for access and refresh tokens.
Issue a new access token using a refresh token.

get.description: Return the authenticated user and org context.
